backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user profiles, game catalog with CRUD operations, platform types (PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox), and role-based access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: replacing platform emoji icons with actual logo images in GameCard.tsx and adding white navigation arrows to horizontally scrollable game rows in GameCatalog.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the Dragon Games Store application with authentication, game catalog, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for consistent styling across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Dragon Games Store React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home page and admin panel, wrapped in a layout with Header, Footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component displaying Dragon Games Store description, platform availability (PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox) with icons, customer statistics, and value propositions with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameForm.ts: Dialog form component for adding/editing games with fields for name, price, platform selection, description, image upload with progress tracking, trailer URL, and sale status toggle.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameList.ts: Admin game management component displaying all games in a grid with edit/delete actions and confirmation dialog for deletions, using GameCard and AdminGameForm components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer component displaying copyright information and a referral link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game card with image, price, platform badges, and action buttons; includes modal dialogs for game details and trailer video playback, plus admin edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/components/GameCatalog.tsx: Renders a searchable game catalog with horizontal scrolling rows of game cards (4 per row), featuring left/right navigation arrows and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, Steam/WhatsApp icons, login/logout button, and conditional admin panel access button based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin role, displaying appropriate login or access denied messages if requirements aren't met.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, prompting authenticated users to enter their name before continuing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, handling actor creation and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user authentication operations including role checking, admin verification, and profile management (get/save).
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for game CRUD operations including fetching all games, filtering by platform/sale status, and add/update/delete mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus custom scrollbar styling and Inter font family.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin page component displaying game management interface with add/edit functionality and game list.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that displays AboutUs section, GameCatalog, and conditionally shows UserProfileSetup dialog for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to replace platform emoji icons with actual logos and add navigation arrows to horizontally scrollable game rows.
